mapper.insert: insert into submit (stud_no, occ_NO, amc_no, submit_ct, submit_sc) values (#{stud_no}, #{occ_NO}, #{amc_no}, #{submit_ct}, 0.0)
mapper.select: select s.submit_no as submit_no, u.user_nm as stud_nm, s.stud_no as stud_no, s.occ_no as occ_no, s.submit_ct as submit_ct, s.amc_no as amc_no, s.submit_sc as submit_sc from submit s, user u where s.stud_no = u.user_no and amc_no = #{amc_no}

select s.submit_no as submit_no, u.user_nm as stud_nm, s.stud_no as stud_no, s.occ_no as occ_no, s.submit_ct as submit_ct, s.amc_no as amc_no, s.submit_sc as submit_sc from submit s, user u where s.stud_no = u.user_no and amc_no = #{amc_no} and stud_no = #{stud_no}
select * from submit where stud_no = #{stud_no} and amc_no = #{amc_no}
